Negative_Energy_Arrows.NAME: Negative Energy Arrows
Negative_Energy_Arrows.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Apply !M! Negative Level.

Negative_Energy_Javelin.NAME: Negative Energy Javelin
Negative_Energy_Javelin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Negative Level.

Thousand_Bone_Knives.NAME: Thousand Bone Knives
Thousand_Bone_Knives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL If you have Bones : NL Hit an additional time.

Shade_Step.NAME: Shade Step
Shade_Step.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If that card is a Skill : NL Gain !M! Energy.

Bone_Armor.NAME: Bone Armor
Bone_Armor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Bones. NL Gain !M! Artifact.

Bone_Armory.NAME: Bone Armory
Bone_Armory.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn : Gain !M! Bones.
